title: Local Electrician 24 Hour call out
content:
Welcome to a markdown rendered page from NetlifyCMS!

We can do formatting like **Bold** and *Italics*, we can make lists:

* With bullet points

1. Or numbers

and much more. 

Just note, because tailwind.css overwrites all the default element styles, you'll need to add css to render these properly, check the css/tailwind.css file for more.

 The data files are stored as JSON so that we get type inference for free with typescript.

serviceBlock.content:
### Working with us is a pleasure

Don't let your uses guess by attaching tooltips and popoves to any element. Just make sure you enable them first via JavaScript.

The kit comes with three pre-built pages to help you get started faster. You can change the text and images and you're good to go. Just make sure you enable them first via JavaScript.

[Check Tailwind Starter Kit!](http://localhost:3000/#)
